query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT s.symbol) as total_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStocks WHERE updatedAt IS NOT NULL) as synced_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usStockPrices) as total_price_records,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT symbol) FROM usStockPrices) as stocks_with_prices,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usDataSyncStatus) as sync_status_records,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usDataSyncErrors WHERE resolved = false) as unresolved_errors,
  (SELECT MAX(updatedAt) FROM usStocks) as latest_sync_time,
  (SELECT MIN(date) FROM usStockPrices) as earliest_price_date,
  (SELECT MAX(date) FROM usStockPrices) as latest_price_date
FROM usStocks s

FROM usStocks s
